ResearchProjectDef.label: Low-power Nexus connection
ResearchProjectDef.description: Establish a primitive connection to the Nexus. The primitiveness of this connection means the information we can transmit and recieve is limited. More advanced technologies will need something better...

ResearchProjectDef.label: Molecular Lathing
ResearchProjectDef.description: Using extreme temperatures and nanotechnology, we can restructure materials at a molecular level.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Ferrogel Production
ResearchProjectDef.description: Ferrogel is a component in many Illuminate structures and weapons, and is highly versatile. It is of utmost importance we have a nanolathe configuration to produce it.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Carbon Extraction
ResearchProjectDef.description: Our nanolathes should be able to extract carbon from given resources for future processing. Carbon is used in multiple crafting recipes, but ultimately does very little by itself.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Tungsten Processing
ResearchProjectDef.description: Tungsten is a vital resource for many Illuminate technologies, however it is next to useless in it's raw form. We can configure our nanolathes to process raw tungsten into a more usable form.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Implant Technology
ResearchProjectDef.description: Implants have always been a key component to the Illuminate's success. If we want to continue to be successful, we should study them ourselves as well.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Advanced Implant Technology
ResearchProjectDef.description: Our current implant technologies are useful, but we could use them to do so much more.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Micro-drones
ResearchProjectDef.description: Micro-drones are minature computer systems, though not quite small enough to justify the name "nanomachine". We can equip them to help the user in several tasks.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Nanotechnology
ResearchProjectDef.description: Aerotungsten's unique properties can be exploited to create flexible computers on a molecular scale.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Simple Bionics
ResearchProjectDef.description: Many avali also have bionic limbs to compliment their augmentations. While we cannot manufacture anything near the Illuminate's production quality yet, we can produce simplistic bionics that give us slight improvements over organic limbs.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Advanced Bionics technolgies
ResearchProjectDef.description: We can further specialize our colonists with powerful, high-end bionic limbs.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Basic Illuminate Weaponry
ResearchProjectDef.description: Now that we have access to tungsten, we can start manufacturing weapons to defend ourselves.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Advanced Coilguns
ResearchProjectDef.description: With significant improvements to our coilgun designs, we can create more powerful, specialized weaponry.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Defensive Solutions
ResearchProjectDef.description: We should take steps to defend our colony. A clear, and straightfoward step towards this is unmanned turrets, which need little supervision when defending our colony from would-be attackers.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Suborbital Rocketry
ResearchProjectDef.description: We can enhance both our offensive and defensive capability with sub-orbital rocketry weapons, not unlike mortars used by other inhabitants of the rimworld. However, we can make our system significantly more accurate with computer assist systems.

ResearchProjectDef.label: AERIAL
ResearchProjectDef.description: The AERIAL system is the final solution to all long-range attacks, featuring high-power explosives, a fully automated launch system, and the capacity to hold 6 rockets at one, as well as simultaneously fire two at once.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Advanced Melee Tech
ResearchProjectDef.description: We can use ferrogel and tungsten to make higher-end Illuminate weaponry.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Aero-tungsten Carbide Forging
ResearchProjectDef.description: Using our nanolathes, we can forge tungsten, ferrogel, and carbon into a high-durability metal.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Molecular Weaving
ResearchProjectDef.description: We can apply the processes used in looms on a molecular scale to create more resistant fabric-like materials

ResearchProjectDef.label: Nanofibers
ResearchProjectDef.description: By using our newly designed nanoloom, we can start to weave materials on a molecular level. This fiber is a perfect way to test our nanoloom, and make sure all functions work as intended. It is also somewhat better than normal fabric.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Common Illuminate Apparel
ResearchProjectDef.description: We can also use our nanoloom like a normal loom; it is equally capable of creating clothing.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Scouting Equipment
ResearchProjectDef.description: It is highly likely that we will have to explore beyond our colony, for one reason or another. We should design armour to protect our scouts, while keeping them lightweight.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Combat-ready Armour
ResearchProjectDef.description: We need to be ready for any type of opponent. With how frail the Avali are, combat armour will play a critical role in our survival.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Elite Operations
ResearchProjectDef.description: We can take our combat capabilities even further. This suits powerful augmentations and user integration make it one of the most powerful Illuminate designs we can access.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Interlocking Materials
ResearchProjectDef.description: Now that we have proven our nanoloom to be fully functional, we can start to interweave different types of materials. Carbon and nanofiber should create a particularly resistant fabric.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Ferrogel Insulation
ResearchProjectDef.description: Ferrogel is a particularly good insulation material. By interweaving it with nanofiber, we believe we could create a fabric with similar properties.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Insulated Clothing
ResearchProjectDef.description: We can utilize ferroweave in combination with other fabrics to create highly insulative clothing..

ResearchProjectDef.label: Restructured Aero-tungsten
ResearchProjectDef.description: We can interlace our fabric with aero-tungsten carbide to gain some of it's high structural stability in fabric. Naturally, it is not quite as strong.
